about_the_game: "Fania" is a cute and whimsical story adventure game that follows the adorable adventures of a panda named Fania. One rainy morning, Fania wakes up with an insatiable craving for a tuna sandwich, setting off on her quest to find the perfect ingredients. Navigate through lush forests, deserts, bustling towns and many more places as Fania encounters quirky characters and overcomes challenging obstacles in pursuit of the mouthwatering sandwich. Along the way, players will discover hidden secrets, unlock alternate endings, and solve puzzles to aid Fania in her delightful tuna sandwich quest. With its delightful visuals, endearing characters, and lighthearted gameplay, "Fania" is a delightful treat for players that love adventure.

content_descriptors.notes: "Fania" contains highly controversial and disturbing content that includes depictions of suicide, gore, and intense violence. Players should have caution before engaging with this game, as it may be emotionally distressing or triggering for some individuals.

name: Fania

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WindowsR 8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: WindowsR 8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 3.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU / NVIDIA GeForce GTX750 or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0

short_description: Join Fania, a hungry panda, on an adorable whimsical journey through different places, solving puzzles, and meeting quirky characters. Help Fania collect ingredients, overcome challenges, and discover the ultimate recipe, all while spreading joy and smiles in this delightful adventure.
